history.proof: intros a b H1 H2. qsimpl use: Zeven_plus_Zodd. srun best use: Zodd_plus_Zodd, Zodd_opp2 unfold: BinIntDef.Z.sub.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : Z H1 : Zodd a H2 : Zodd b Unable to unify "match ?M1837 + ?M1838 with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => False | _ => True end" with "match a - b with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => True | _ => False end".

original: intros a b H1 H2. apply Zeven_plus_Zodd; auto.
